parameters.name: markSeen
parameters.label: Mark email message(s) as read when fetched

mapper.data:
{
  "model": "command-r-plus",
  "prompt": "Analyze the following project-related email and return a JSON with:

- is_junk (true/false)
- should_draft (true/false)
- reply (a short polite response)
- is_important (true/false)
- has_deadline (true/false)
- deadline (ISO format string or null)
- project_name (string or null)
- is_delayed (true/false)
- reminder_level (1/2/3/null)
- should_notify_manager (true/false)
- should_notify_senior_management (true/false)

Rules:
- If the email is unrelated to work or project status, mark is_junk = true.
- If the email contains text like "Reminder 1", "Reminder 2", or "Reminder 3", set reminder_level accordingly.
- If it's a third reminder (reminder_level 3) and the project is delayed, set should_notify_manager = true.
- If the project is already delayed and a manager alert was previously sent (you'll need to infer this from context or a prompt update) and no resolution, set should_notify_senior_management = true.
- project_name is the name of the project mentioned explicitly in the email or implied by context. If unsure, return null.
- Focus on extracting factual information based *only* on the email content provided.
- The 'reply' field should be a very brief, generic acknowledgment, or state why it's junk.

Email:
Subject: {{21.text}}
Body: {{22.text}}",
  "max_tokens": 500,
  "temperature": 0.3
}

parameters.name: handleErrors
parameters.label: Evaluate all states as errors (except for 2xx and 3xx )

expect.name: shareCookies
expect.label: Share cookies with other HTTP modules

expect.name: rejectUnauthorized
expect.label: Reject connections that are using unverified (self-signed) certificates

expect.name: useQuerystring
expect.label: Disable serialization of multiple same query string keys as arrays

expect.name: useDefault
expect.label: Use the default reminder settings for this event

expect.name: sendUpdates
expect.label: Send notifications about the event creation

mapper.body: "Important: You have a new email that requires your attention."

mapper.html: "This is reminder level {{9.reminder_level}} for project {{9.project_name}}. Please update the status."
mapper.subject: "Reminder for {{9.project_name}} - Level {{9.reminder_level}}"

mapper.html: "Project {{9.project_name}} is delayed after 3 reminders. Please take action."
mapper.subject: "Project {{9.project_name}} is delayed"

mapper.html: "Project {{9.project_name}} has not progressed even after manager alert. Immediate escalation needed."
mapper.subject: "Urgent: Project {{9.project_name}} critically delayed"
